value.0:
Spectre's Custom Writing System

Bongo's writing system is now defunct in favor of a home-grown system utilizing console commands. You will a minimum of three things to utilize this system:
1. A writing instrument (Quill)
2. An ink well (Ink Well)
3. A piece of paper

There are multiple forms of paper that are available to be used. If it is a piece of paper that is able to be written on, it will have a use ability. 

To begin writing, use the paper on yourself.

The following console commands will now be available:
1. -write title <TITLE OF DOCUMENT>
This command will allow you to modify the name of a document.

2. -write new <NEW DESCRIPTION OF DOCUMENT>
This command will replace the entire existing description of a document.

3. -write add <ADDITIONAL DESCRIPTION OF DOCUMENT>
This command will add new text where you left off writing on a document.

4. -write line <ADDITIONAL DESCRIPTION OF DOCUMENT>
This command will add new text on a new line of the document.

If you are a noble or knight with a house ring and sealing wax, you have the additional capability of sealing a document. Sealing a document will prevent anyone from editing it additionally.

To seal a document, type -write seal

You may post documents to the notice board by using the paper on a noticeboard. If it is valid, it will consume the paper.
